Html:
Hello Everybody!

How can i set default style for all cells in PHPExcel?

--
Szaki

This is currently not implemented. I'll create a work item for this.

You can use the following workaround meanwhile:
$styles = $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyles();
$styles'default'->getFont()->setName('Times New Roman');
This discussion has been copied to a work item. Click here to go to the work item and continue the discussion.
PHPExcel_Worksheet->getDefaultStyle() now exposes the default style. (check http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx for latest source)
